maltcms.commands.fragments.preprocessing
Class DefaultVarLoader

java.lang.Object
  cross.commands.fragments.AFragmentCommand
      maltcms.commands.fragments.preprocessing.DefaultVarLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFragmentCommand, ICommand<TupleND<IFileFragment>,TupleND<IFileFragment>>, IWorkflowElement, IEventSource<IWorkflowResult>, IConfigurable, IXMLSerializable
public class DefaultVarLoader
extends AFragmentCommand

Load variables defined by the option default.variables. Additionally tries to load vars defined in the option additional.variables (see cfg/maltcmsvars.properties).

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
